Midnight in Washington is a warning. And call to action. For our democracy.

I hope you'll consider reading it, and giving a copy to your friends and family. I've been told it's a quick beach read!

The paperback is out today, August 16! Order it here:

https://www.amazon.com/Midnight-Washington-Almost-Democracy-Still/dp/0593231538/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/FaTm8EYWAAUqAzu.jpg

I also wrote a new afterword for the paperback edition of Midnight in Washington.

It's a snapshot in time. Just a few weeks after Putin launched his war against Ukraine.

And what that war means for the fight against autocracy abroad.

And for our democracy here at home.

How in our nation's darkest hours the last four years, public servants stood up, no matter the cost.
